cells.title: ProtoPie
cells.text: ProtoPie 今天发布了一个全新的导入插件，可以更高效地将素材导入了。虽然 Figma 自带 Prototype 的已经能满足大部分的需求，不过如果想实现更精细，有更多交互的原型时，可以试下 ProtoPie。
cells.text-en: Import your designs from Figma into ProtoPie and turn them into highly interactive prototypes.
cells.author: ProtoPie

cells.title: Oblique
cells.text: 超强插件，给任意的形状和文字，创建斜面的投影。如果你想创建2.5D，或者透视，可以试下。作者还推荐了另一个类似的插件：Roto。
cells.text-en: create oblique projections of any shape. useful for creating shadows, 3d depth, visual perspective, and more!
cells.author: torcado

cells.title: Vector Field Generator
cells.text: 通过改变各种参数，来生成随机或者定制的向量场。还挺好玩的，不过不知道有什么用，或许可以用来设计背景图案
cells.text-en: Create totally customizable vector fields by changing more than ten different parameters.
cells.author: ADaDDS

cells.title: Chikin Icons
cells.text: 这套图标也太可爱了！爱了。图标数量有一千多个，手绘风格，日常生活中的常见物品图标。
cells.text-en: Chikin Icons For Everything is a unique handcrafted icon set for everything: heart eyes skull — check, alien ice cream — no problem, Freddy Krueger — you got it. First available in Figma and exclusively in our plugin.
cells.author: Chikin Icons

cells.title: 📲 represent
cells.text: 可以将选中的 Frame 生成一个预览码，然后在你的手机上或者桌面浏览器上预览这个 Frame。有点类似于官方的 Mirror，不过这个插件没有即时刷新，也没有手动刷新按钮，体验还是有点差，而且收费还不便宜。不过还是挺喜欢这个插件的思路的，像是 Hosted Export 的升级版。
cells.text-en: Bring your Design seamlessly to Smartphones and Desktops.
cells.author: Swipe Circus

cells.title: Rough
cells.text: 将任何形状的图形转化为手绘的草图风格。非常好玩。
cells.text-en: Rough is a plugin for Figma that lets you to convert any objects to sketchy, hand-drawn-like, style.
cells.author: Andrey Gershun

cells.title: Pack
cells.text: 看到它的密集恐惧图标就知道这个插件是做什么的了。在选中的 Frame 里生成圆填充（Circle Packing），也可以选择方填充。
cells.text-en: Pack allows you to generate a circle packing pattern withing a frame.
cells.author: Varun Vachhar

cells.title: Jali
cells.text: Pack 作者的另一款生成类插件。这款插件可以生成风格特别的镂空图案，可以在它的介绍页里查看详细的介绍。感觉我对这类生成类的插件有特别的偏爱。
cells.text-en: Generative truchet tiles.
cells.author: Varun Vachhar

cells.title: Mockplus
cells.text: 摹客出的 Figma 标注导出插件。
cells.text-en: Mockplus Cloud makes product design collaboration faster and easier. Its features include generating specs smartly, cutting Slices in one click, various note styles, fast interaction, full-view dashboard and team management. Connect entire product design workflow with only one document!
cells.author: Mockplus

cells.title: Artboard Studio Mockups
cells.text: 里边大量的 Mockups， 并且还在不断增加中。使用起来还挺方便的。
cells.text-en: Create mockups in Figma easily by getting access to thousands of world-class quality Artboard Studio mockup items right inside your Figma files. Easily render Figma frames into real-life product mockups with a click of a button. More items are added to our ever-growing library every day.
cells.author: Artboard Studio

cells.title: Abstract
cells.text: 在 Sketch 时代就知名，并且有很多团队使用的设计版本管理协作工具。现在上了 Figma 插件社区，不过还在内测阶段，可以期待一下他们最终会做成什么形式的。
cells.text-en: Abstract is a design delivery platform that empowers teams to move from influence to impact.
cells.author: Abstract

cells.title: Sleuth
cells.text: 扫描你的 Figma 文件，帮你计算出外面组件的使用率。而且可以找出所有没有使用字体和颜色样式的图层，帮你定位问题。非常实用的一个插件。
cells.text-en: Sleuth helps you follow best practices by reportinng on external library usage and identifying problem layers in your files.
cells.author: Keap

cells.title: Find & Replace
cells.text: 查找设计稿中的文本并替换成你想要的文字。类似于文档中的查找与替换。
cells.text-en: I couldn't find a plugin that let me find and replace text using regular expressions, so I threw this together. Maybe you'll find it handy, too.
cells.author: Aaron Wright

cells.title: Random Shapes
cells.text: 生成各种抽象的图形。比如 Blob，如果想做一些背景图案，或者形状装饰，可以试一下。
cells.text-en: Abstract random shapes generator
cells.author: Anton Evstigneev

cells.title: Figma Manager
cells.text: 和 Design System Organizer 类似的组件与样式整理插件，方便整理组件与样式的名字，而且感觉用起来要更便捷。经常处理组件库的人会很实用。
cells.text-en: A fast and easy way to organize your Figma documents. No more hassle with long and complex symbols name, or renaming tons of components and layer styles because you misspelled a folder name.
cells.author: Jaer Pollux

cells.title: Instant Website
cells.text: 将你的 Figma 原型直接生成一个可以点击的网页，简单体验了一下，速度还可以，而且保留了 Figma Prototype 中的跳转。不过还没深度体验，不知道能不能支持其他的 Figma Prototype 中的功能。
cells.text-en: turning your Figma designs into real websites you can share, no login required!
cells.author: Instant Website

cells.title: Slazzer
cells.text: 和 Remove bg 差不多的一个插件。直接选中想要抠图的图片，然后运行插件就可以。
cells.text-en: Slazzer auto background removal platform will quickly remove any image background in just a few seconds.
cells.author: David J Turner

cells.title: Coda for Figma
cells.text: 类似于 Google Sheets Sync 的内容填充插件。不过这个文档是创建在 Coda 的，可以对比使用一下。
cells.text-en: Design with data from apps like Spotify, Wikipedia or your own custom data with this plugin. This plugin works with Coda, a tool for making documents. Simply create a table in Coda, and use the plugin to fill your designs with content from the tables.
cells.author: Carlo Jörges

cells.title: Custom Graph
cells.text: 可以根据你设计的元素，来生成柱状图等等。可以自己填数值。
cells.text-en: Custom Graph lets you build line, bar and cumulative graphs based on your design elements.
cells.author: GoodGantt for Trello

cells.title: Color Luminance
cells.text: 一个多功能的颜色对比度检测插件，还挺实用的。
cells.text-en: Display the relative luminance (how bright color appear to our eyes) of the selected colors.
cells.author: Tommy Johansen

cells.title: Multilingual Font Mixer
cells.text: 给一段多语言混排的文本里，给不同语言设置不同的字体和样式。
cells.text-en: Now you can mix multilingual text, styled with the fonts of your choice, with one click!
cells.author: Digital Creative
